prompt: Company named TechCorp was founded in 2010, headquartered in San Francisco, California with 500 employees. The CEO is Jane Smith and they have an annual revenue of $50 million. The company operates in the technology industry.

Global Solutions Inc. is a consulting firm founded in 2005 with headquarters in New York City. They have 1200 employees and their CEO is John Doe. The company generates approximately $120 million in annual revenue.
MediHealth Systems was established in 1998 in Boston, Massachusetts. The healthcare technology company has 750 employees and is led by CEO Sarah Johnson. Their latest reported revenue is $80 million.
